trolldom.advancements.discovery.root.des: Explore the world and discover its mysteries
trolldom.advancements.discovery.air_shri: Find an air shrine in a mountainous, badlands, hilly, savanna or plains biome
trolldom.advancements.discovery.air_boon:
Gain the boon of air by gliding on the draft above the altar of an air shrine for 6 seconds

§7§oThe drafts can be a bit tricky to figure out
trolldom.advancements.discovery.water_sh: Find a water shrine in a deep ocean biome
trolldom.advancements.discovery.water_bo: Gain the boon of water by swimming through all five seafloor gates in quick succession
Sleep while holding a Heart of the Sea to reset the effect of the water boon
trolldom.advancements.discovery.earth_sh: Discover an earth shrine deep underground, where deepslate meets stone
trolldom.advancements.discovery.earth_bo: Gain the boon of earth by meditating atop the central pillar of an earth shrine
trolldom.advancements.discovery.fire_shr: Find a fire shrine in the nether
trolldom.advancements.discovery.fire_boo:
Gain the boon of fire by lighting coal blocks in the central braziers of a fire spire

§7§oBring some extra coal blocks in case they burn out before the ritual finishes
trolldom.advancements.discovery.double_b: Hold two elemental boons at the same time, boons from opposing elements do not mix
effect.trolldom.fire_boon.tooltip: Gain §e+%s%%§r attack speed and mining speed for §e%s§r seconds whenever a nearby entity takes fire damage. Can hold up to §e%s§r charges, hitting an entity or breaking a block removes a charge.
effect.trolldom.water_boon.tooltip:
Gain §e+%s§r attack damage and §e-%s%%§r mining speed when attacking an entity, or the reverse when breaking blocks (triggers every 10th block).
Stacks up to §e%s§r times in either direction.

§lCurrent:
 §e%s§7 attack damage
 §e%s%%§7 mining speed
effect.trolldom.earth_boon.tooltip: Provides a §e%s§r point absorption shield, the shield replenishes after §e%s§r seconds of not taking damage.
effect.trolldom.air_boon.tooltip: Provides §e+%s%%§r movement speed. Pressing §e%s§r grants §eDraft§r in the nearest cardinal direction to where the player is moving, the §eDraft§r effect lasts §e%s§r seconds and has a §e%s§r second cooldown.
effect.trolldom.air_boon.tooltip_expande: Draft pushes the player either upwards or forward depending on the direction of the draft and where the player is looking.
